content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day April 7, 2017 Point, Click and Hack  Phishers Try Wix April 7, 2017 Wix allows anyone to create a free website with simple point, click and drag formatting. Of course, anyone can include phishers and malware distributors, and we at the Cyren Security Lab discovered earlier this week just such abuse of a Wix page targeted at Office 365 users, the subject of Company Partners Resources Investor Relations Products Freeware Demo Solutions Contact Us Privacy Management Service by Data443
